thread.title: These NJ restaurants have both the best pizza and cheesesteaks
thread.title_full: These NJ restaurants have both the best pizza and cheesesteaks

author: Bill Spadea
title: These NJ restaurants have both the best pizza and cheesesteaks
text: These NJ restaurants have both the best pizza and cheesesteaks As you know, I'm a bit of a cheesesteak aficionado. At least in my own head. Either way, I love a good cheesesteak and pizza. Some places have figured out the magic of combining the two. Delicious! When I brought this up on the air, our lines were flooded with calls about local go-to favorites around the Garden State. It's one of the reasons that I'm diggin' in. No way you're getting great pizza and cheesesteaks anywhere else. Here's the extended list for you to check out and hopefully try, at least one place on the list, this weekend! Make sure that if you have friends and family traveling in from other states to visit you for the holidays you don't let 'em leave before trying some delicious Jersey pizza! [Dario Pizza Pasta Panini](https://www.facebook.com/people/Dario-Pizza-Pasta-Panini/100063442820856/) in Toms River [DeLucia's Brick Oven Pizza](https://www.deluciasbrickovenpizza.com/) in Raritan [Lillo's Tomato Pies](https://www.facebook.com/LillosTomatoPies/) in Hainesport [Cafe Bello](https://cafebellobayonne.com/) in Bayonne [Villaggio Iccara](https://www.iccara.com/) in Yardville [Marinelli's Pizza](https://www.marinellisrestaurant.com/) in Flemington [Varsity Pizza & Subs](https://www.varsity-pizza.com/) in Lawrenceville [Tavolo Pronto](https://www.tavolopronto.com/) in Fair Haven [Angelotti's Pizza & Trattoria](https://angelottispizza.net/) in Morganville [The Coal House Sea Girt](https://www.thecoalhouseseagirt.com/) in Sea Girt [Joe Spano's Tomato Pies](https://www.joespanostomatopiesmenu.com/) in Point Pleasant [Dicola's Pizza](https://www.dicolaspizzanj.com/) in Washington [Pat's Pizza](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063792002020) in Point Pleasant [Rosie's Pizza](https://www.rosiesppb.com/) in Point Pleasant Beach [Joey's Pizza of Hamilton](https://ilovejoeyspizza.com/) in Hamilton [Buona Pizza](https://www.buonapizzabernardsville.com/?utm_source=gbp) in Bernardsville [Star Tavern](https://www.startavern.net/) in Orange [Stan's Chitch's Cafe](https://zmenu.com/stans-chitchs-pizza-restaurant-and-bar-bound-brook-online-menu/) in Bound Brook [Klee's Bar & Grill](https://www.kleesbarandgrill.com/) in Seaside Heights [Saturn Pizza Princeton](https://www.saturnpizzaprinceton.com/) inside the Ivy Inn in Princeton [Meatheadz Cheesesteak](https://www.meatheadzcheesesteaks.com/) in Lawrence Restaurants that closed in New Jersey During 2023 [Dan.Alexander@townsquaremedia.com](mailto:Dan.Alexander@townsquaremedia.com">Dan.Alexander@townsquaremedia.com). Gallery Credit: Dan Alexander The post above reflects the thoughts and observations of New Jersey 101.5 talk show host Bill Spadea. Any opinions expressed are Bill's own. Bill Spadea is on the air weekdays from 6 to 10 a.m., talkin’ Jersey, taking your calls at 1-800-283-1015.
